name: skill_creator
description: Create and manage custom skills so the bot can learn new capabilities. Use when a task requires a repeatable workflow the bot doesn't have yet, or when the user asks to create, update, list, or delete skills.

tools.name: skill_create
tools.description: Create a new custom skill with tools.json, SKILL.md, and an executable script. The skill becomes immediately available after creation.

description.description: Short description of what the skill does and when to use it.

instructions.description: Usage instructions in markdown â€” guidance for the LLM when the skill is activated.

tools.description: Tool definitions for the skill. Each tool becomes callable after activation.

name.description: Tool name (skill_name prefix recommended, e.g. myskill_run).

script.description: JavaScript source code implementing the tool handlers.

tools.name: skill_get
tools.description: Get the definition of a skill (tools.json + SKILL.md content).

tools.name: skill_update
tools.description: Update a custom skill's description, instructions, tools, or script.
New tool definitions (replaces existing tools in tools.json).

tools.name: skill_reload
tools.description: Reload one or all skills from disk. Use after manually editing skill files.

name.description: Skill name to reload. Omit to reload all skills.
